kv4.5:1.3_0: Arahā chahi phassehi, chahi vedanāhi, chahi saññāhi …pe… chahi paññāhi samannāgatoti?
kv4.5:2.3_0: Arahā cakkhunā rūpaṁ passanto sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusati, manasā dhammaṁ vijānāti …pe…
kv4.5:2.4_0: manasā dhammaṁ vijānanto cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv4.5:3.3_0: Satataṁ samitaṁ abbokiṇṇaṁ chahi upekkhāhi samannāgato samohito, cha upekkhāyo paccupaṭṭhitāti?
kv4.5:4.6_0: Hañci arahā chaḷaṅgupekkho, tena vata re vattabbe—
